SEARCH
Package Map

Class TrafficNetwork

java.lang.Object
Map.TrafficNetwork
public class TrafficNetwork extends Object
Represents the entire traffic network within the simulation. This class manages all the roads and intersections, facilitating operations on the traffic network, such as accessing road segments, intersections, and checking for vehicle densities.
